text: Song Kang-ho (born January 17, 1967) is a South Korean actor. He is known for his roles in No. 3 (1997), Joint Security Area (2000), Sympathy for Mr. Vengeance (2002), Memories of Murder (2003), The Host (2006), and A Taxi Driver (2017). He also appeared in Snowpiercer (2013) and Parasite (2019). ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean television actors
title: Song Kang-ho
